mapper.select: SELECT ec.event_comment_key eventCommentKey , ec.event_comment_content eventCommentContent , ec.createdate createdate , ec.event_key eventKey , c.customer_id customerId , ci.file_name fileName FROM event_comment ec INNER JOIN customer c ON ec.customer_id = c.customer_id INNER JOIN customer_img ci ON ci.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE ec.event_key = #{eventKey} ORDER BY ec.createdate DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
